nodes.text: Chargutt Lo was a Gamorrean who was serving a fifteen year sentence on Garen IV for aggravated assault. The criminal's profile in the New Republic prison registry was one of several that Marshal Carasynthia Dune looked at from her office on the planet Nevarro in around 9 ABY while searching for the profile of prisoner Migs Mayfeld.
Chargutt Lo's profile first appeared in "Chapter 14: The Tragedy", the sixth episode of the second season of The Mandalorian, which was released on December 4, 2020.
